quotes.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.
Our power is in our ability to decide.
Power doesn't corrupt people, people corrupt power.
Power intoxicates men. When a man is intoxicated by alcohol, he can recover, but when intoxicated by power, he seldom recovers.
The measure of a man is what he does with power.
Character is power.

Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
Power will intoxicate the best hearts, as wine the strongest heads. No man is wise enough, nor good enough to be trusted with unlimited power.
The less power a man has, the more he likes to use it.
The desire of power in excess caused the angels to fall.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
It is said that power corrupts, but actually it's more true that power attracts the corruptible. The sane are usually attracted by other things than power.
Power is not alluring to pure minds.
All the power that we exercise over others depends on the power we exercise over ourselves.
Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power.
Power always thinks it has a great soul and vast views beyond the comprehension of the weak.
Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
Power can be taken, but not given. The process of the taking is empowerment in itself.
If power is for sale, sell your mother to buy it. You can always buy her back again.
Power is the by-product of understanding.
Power? It's like a Dead Sea fruit. When you achieve it, there is nothing there.
The greatest power is often simple patience.
Power is neither good nor evil, but its user makes it so.
Power doesn't always roar...The art of exerting power is an art used in doses - the more hidden it is the more effective.
The best people to have power are the ones who don't want it.
Power is not revealed by striking hard or often, but by striking true.
Power is not sufficient evidence of truth.
The sole advantage of power is that you can do more good.
Power never takes a back step - only in the face of more power.
